questions.question_text: Which device should this WLED effect run on? I don’t see a clearly named WLED light in your devices list—did you mean one of these, or is the WLED light missing from Home Assistant?
options: It’s a different WLED light that isn’t in this list (I’ll add/confirm it in Home Assistant)

questions.question_text: When the 15-second random WLED effect ends, do you want the light to fully restore all previous settings (effect, color, brightness, speed, intensity, and power state), or only color/brightness?
options: Restore everything exactly (effect, color, brightness, speed, intensity, and whether it was on or off)
Only restore brightness and on/off state

answers.answer_text: It’s a different WLED light that isn’t in this list (I’ll add/confirm it in Home Assistant)
Restore everything exactly (effect, color, brightness, speed, intensity, and whether it was on or off)
